name: BNNSLayerParametersReduction
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a reduction layer.

items.name: init(i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, w_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, reduce_func: BNNSReduceFunction, epsilon: Float)
items.desc: Returns a structure containing the parameters of a reduction layer from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a structure containing the parameters of a reduction layer.

items.name: var reduce_func: BNNSReduceFunction
items.desc: The variable that specifies the reduction function.

items.name: var epsilon: Float
items.desc: A value that the operation adds to each element when computing the sum of logarithms.
